name: ME1RO
description:
A game about being lost in the crowd and miss opportunies.

Game made in 48h for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019.

Use the arrow keys to control the character and the space bar to resist the crowd. Resist will consume stamina, when depleted you won't be able to move for some seconds.

Team: 

Thibault LAINE
Erwan NORMAND
Damien CLERGEAUD
Pierre-Antoine CINQUIN
Sol ROO

Thanks for playing !
